dataset_id: BOREAS/SRC AMS Suite A Surface Meteorological and Radiation Data: 1994
title: BOREAS/SRC AMS Suite A Surface Meteorological and Radiation Data: 1994
summary: Contains the data collected in 1994 by the AMS suite A instrument set operated by SRC and provided to BORIS.
